content.en: Speech enhancement: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve speech recognition in adverse conditions and enhance speech quality. These algorithms utilize techniques such as mel cepstrum-based feature computation, spectral estimation, adaptive digital filters, wavelet packet decomposition-based denoising, and perceptual wavelet denoising. By exploiting correlations between different time frames, updating magnitude spectra, and considering spectro-temporal modulation frequencies, these algorithms aim to reduce noise distortions and increase the robustness of automatic speech recognition systems in noisy environments.
content.da: Tale-forbedring: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre talegenkendelse under ugunstige forhold og øge talekvaliteten. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som mel-cepstrum-baseret feature-beregning, spektral estimering, adaptive digitale filtre, wavelet-pakke-dekomponering-baseret støjreduktion og perceptuel wavelet-støjreduktion. Ved at udnytte korrelationer mellem forskellige tidsrammer, opdatere storhedsspektra og overveje spektral-tidslig modulationsfrekvenser, sigter disse algoritmer mod at reducere støjforvrængninger og øge robustheden af automatiske talegenkendelsessystemer i støjende miljøer.
